td.content: s:34 YO white m dog walker describes moderate feeling of increasing tiredness, moderate pencil thin stools and moderate weight loss. o:Height 75 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 425 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 20 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Double-contrast barium enema.

s:a 35 year old white m dog walker presents with moderate weight loss, moderate pencil thin stools and moderate feeling of increasing tiredness x 6 weeks. Denies ever using tobacco Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 75 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:a 35 yo white male dog walker presents with moderate pencil thin stools, moderate weight loss. pt also reports of moderate feeling of increasing tiredness. o:Height 75 in, Weight 166 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 425 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 20 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Right hemicolectomy - colon.
